ygData.subject: Re: Tome of Magi additions/corrections (minor)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Violet Robes are medium sized (cannot be worn by gnomes) Yellow Robes Change ware to wear & Yes, they are gnome only
ygData.messageBody:
Elkantar The Wizard wrote:

> From: "Elkantar The Wizard" <the_elkantar@...>
>
> It is my belief that magi(all casting classes) should be the
> knowledge base for the lore(history/myths) of the EQ world. So
> below is my growing list of summerized Q & A's from this list.
> Please feel free to use it to impress you friends. Remember
> we are wizards keeper of knowledge, destroyer of worlds.
>
> If you see something missing or just wrong please reply and
> I will save all subjects that contain "Tome of Magi".
>
> 5-16-99 Changed Woven and Netted armor info.
> Updated Skull of Jhen Tra info.
> Added new item Hollow Skull.
> Added Skills vs Spells list.
>
> Tome of Magi V1.2
>
> Items Info/Location
> ---------------------- --------------------------------------------
> Black Flowing Robe Najena
> Blue Robe Erudin, Qeynos
> Brown/orange Robe Thaumaturgist Robe (befallen)
> Dingy White Robe Damask (befallen)
> Green Robe Felwithe
> Red Robe Erudin
> Violet Robe Freeport
> White Robe Gossimer (befallen)
> Yellow Robe Ak'anon (Though I think only gnomes can ware
> them).
>

Violet Robes are medium sized (cannot be worn by gnomes)
Yellow Robes Change ware to wear & Yes, they are gnome only
